author: cnbc.com
title: HP Inc. to Announce Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2018 Earnings on May 29, 2018
text:
PALO ALTO, Calif., May 15, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HP Inc. (NYSE:HPQ) will present a live audio webcast of a conference call to review financial results for the second fiscal quarter ended April 30, 2018 on Tuesday, May 29, 2018 at 5:00 p.m. ET / 2:00 p.m. PT.
The webcast will be available at www.hp.com/investor/2018Q2Webcast . A replay of the audio webcast will be available at the same website shortly after the call and will remain available for approximately one year.
About HP Inc.
HP Inc. creates technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. Through our portfolio of printers, PCs, mobile devices, solutions, and services, we engineer experiences that amaze. More information about HP (NYSE:HPQ) is available at www.hp.com .
